name: MyUni Rectifier 1.2
description: Makes UofA's MyUni Canvas fill the browser window, keeps the navigation bar visible and does away with the coat of arms.
additional_info:
1.2
- Updated to work with the new layout introduced mid-2019.
- The width of the right side panel now adapts to the screen size and layout.
- Scrolling outside of course pages works now.

1.1
- Scrolling enabled in the course navigation pane. The navigation pane is scrollable if it overflows the viewport, otherwise scrolling in the navigation pane now scrolls the content.

1.0
- Initial release: Makes UofA's MyUni Canvas fill the browser window, keeps the navigation bar visible and does away with the coat of arms.
